title: Vintage to avant-garde: International Autoshow is back with its 3rd edition in Bengaluru
description: The 3rd edition of the International Autoshow in Bengaluru, organized by Triune Exhibitors Pvt Ltd and TYGA events, will take place from September 13-16. The event features over 100 companies, showcasing both vintage and futuristic vehicles. Highlights include vintage cars from Payana Vintage Car Museum and the unveiling of India's first all-terrain vehicles by A-thon.
